body: @carlos-a-crespo this is your task now, please help. The budget of it is **30 mins**
@yegor256 do we already know classes and interfaces should be public?

more or less:
1. all interfaces
2. `RtGithub`
3. `MkGithub`, `MkStorage`

That's it :)

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

body: @carlos-a-crespo the ticket is with you for 11 days already. If it's not finished in the next 48 hours, it will be re-assigned to someone else, see [No Obligations](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations) principle

@carlos-a-crespo it takes too long. Usually, we expect any task to be finished in less than a week. I'll assign someone else. Please stop working with it right now. See our [no obligations](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles#no-obligations) principle
@svarovski can you please help? Keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles). If you have any technical questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
@svarovski The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed.
